data.Vojtěch Peterka:
Vojtěch is a kind former local activist who is obsessed with over-knee socks.

Vojtech Peterka is a 26-year-old former local activist who enjoys Rubix cube, theatre and photography. He is kind and caring, but can also be very cowardly and a bit impatient.

He is Czech. He didn't finish school. He is allergic to nickel. He is obsessed with over-knee socks.

Physically, Vojtech is in good shape. He is very short with olive skin, black hair and brown eyes.

He grew up in a working class neighbourhood. He was raised by his father, his mother having left when he was young.

He is currently in a relationship with Mollie Connie Walker. Mollie is 10 years older than him and works as a legal secretary.

Vojtěch's best friend is a former local activist called Howard Zhang. They are inseparable. He also hangs around with Ariel Rogers and Anne Wood. They enjoy binge-watching boxed sets together.

basic_information.Name: Vojtěch Peterka
basic_information.Relationship status: In a relationship with Mollie Connie Walker

physical_characteristics.Hairstyle: hair shaved to grade 2 all over
physical_characteristics.Other words that might be used: clipped, little, short, slim, squat, stumpy

personality.Hobbies: Rubix cube, theatre, photography, binge-watching boxed sets, helping old ladies across the road, meditation, bowling

background.Early years: Vojtěch grew up in an impoverished neighbourhood. He was raised by his father, his mother having left when he was young.
background.Formative years: Vojtěch got is first job as a local activist at age 18. Vojtěch dropped out of school.
background.Most traumatic childhood experience: His mother leaving when he was one.

mollie_connie_walker.Relationship: They get on well but lack chemistry

ariel_marissa_rogers.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

anne_dora_wood.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

ada_vanessa_ortiz.Reason for breakup: Ada wanted somebody with a bit more 'grr'

timeline.1994: Mother, Lena Isabel Rodriguez walks out
timeline.2010: Gets together with Ada Vanessa Ortiz.
timeline.2011: Relationship with Ada Vanessa Ortiz ends (Ada wanted somebody with a bit more 'grr'). Starts work at The Centre Party at local activist
timeline.2012: Gets together with Leah Carter Lewis.
timeline.2013: Relationship with Leah Carter Lewis ends (Leah wanted somebody less dastardly).
timeline.2015: Gets together with Mollie Connie Walker.
timeline.2019: Resigns (7 year itch) from job as local activist at The Centre Party
